Dear Hagop, dear Joe,

 

Could you please confirm that we could accept the provision below. CSI is the Vendor.

 

Insurance. Vendor represents that Vendor carries comprehensive liability insurance with coverage (including, but not limited to, product liability coverage) of not less than Five Million Dollars ($5,000,000) per occurrence and Five Million Dollars ($5,000,000) general aggregate.  Vendor shall include Zola as additional insured on such policy and require that  Zola is provided with at least thirty days’ written notice of any cancellation or change to Vendor’s policy. The insurance policy pursuant to this paragraph shall be evidenced by a certificate of insurance, which shall be provided to Zola upon written request.

 

Best regards,

Pauline

 

Pauline BATTINI
